meanings.definition: Inflammation of the intestines and colon.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with enterocolitis after examining his intestines and colon.
meanings.sent2: Enterocolitis can cause severe pain in the stomach due to inflammation of the intestines and colon.
meanings.sent3: When the intestines and colon decided to throw a party, enterocolitis showed up uninvited and caused a ruckus.
meanings.sent4: The storm of enterocolitis ravaged the intestines and colon like a fierce hurricane.
meanings.sent5: The red, angry inflammation of enterocolitis painted a vivid picture of discomfort in the intestines and colon.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by inflammation of the small and large intestines.
meanings.sent1: The patient's persistent abdominal pain was a clear sign of enterocolitis affecting both small and large intestines.
meanings.sent2: Enterocolitis can lead to serious complications when it spreads throughout the small and large intestines.
meanings.sent3: The small and large intestines were not amused when enterocolitis decided to crash their party.
meanings.sent4: The inflammation of enterocolitis spread through the intestines like wildfire, causing chaos in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The relentless attack of enterocolitis on the small and large intestines left a lasting impression of discomfort and pain.
